feature: Staffing Engine Improvements - Dynamic cost scoring, skills-based filtering, and expanded compliance logic

stories.title: Make cost anchors dynamic based on duration
acceptance_criteria: AC1: Cost anchors scale proportionally with project duration (3mo, 6mo, 12mo)
AC2: 3-month project uses lower anchors than 12-month project
AC3: Cost scores remain in 0-100 range regardless of duration

verification.browser: Open Staffing tab, compare cost scores for same candidate at 3mo vs 12mo duration

stories.title: Add skills-based weighting to candidate scoring
acceptance_criteria: AC1: UI allows user to specify required skills for the project
AC2: Candidates with matching skills get a bonus to their score
AC3: Skills match percentage shown in results table
AC4: Existing functionality unchanged when no skills selected

verification.browser: Select skills in UI, run optimization, verify skill-matching candidates rank higher

stories.title: Expand compliance logic with jurisdiction-specific rules
acceptance_criteria: AC1: USA compliance rules added (ESTA limited to 90 days, B1/B2 cannot work)
AC2: Singapore compliance rules added (Employment Pass required for work)
AC3: Risk notes displayed in results table
AC4: Compliance score properly penalises high-risk scenarios

verification.browser: Run optimization for USA/Singapore, verify risk warnings appear for non-compliant visa types

notes: Project uses vanilla HTML/CSS/JS with no build step
No automated tests - verification is browser-based
Skills available in mock data: Wartsila 31, Start-up, Safety Lead, Commissioning, Mechanical, Overhaul, PMP, Logistics, Electrical
